exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros H. apply Build_is_linear. - intros x y. unfold is_linear in H. destruct H as [Hp1 Hp2 Hp3]. rewrite Hp1. reflexivity. - intros k0 x. unfold is_linear in H. destruct H as [Hp1 Hp2 Hp3]. rewrite Hp2. reflexivity. - unfold is_linear in H. destruct H as [Hp1 Hp2 Hp3]. apply Hp3.
